CustomField.formula:
CASE(TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName), '1 - Possibility','Mulighet', '2 - RFI','RFI', '3 - Prequal','Prekval', '4 - Offer', 'Tilbud', '5 - Awarded', 'Tildelt - venter p√• kontrakt', 'Closed Won', 'Vunnet', 'Closed Lost', 'Tapt', 'Abandoned by Us', 'Forlatt av oss', 'Abandoned by Customer', 'Forlatt av kunde', '')
+ IF(OR( TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = '2 - RFI', TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = '3 - Prequal', TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) = '4 - Offer' ), CASE(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Status__c), 'In progress',' - I arbeid', 'Sent',' - Sendt', ''), '')
CustomField.label: Status
